bibl.title: Judaean Desert Marriage Documents and Ekdosis in the Greek Law of the Roman Period.

series.title: Supplements to the Journal for the Study of Judaism.

bibl.note: [Introduction.] The starting point of the discussion is P. Yadin I, 18. - The main features of the Ekdosis according to the Egyptian material. - The Ekdosis in the Greek marriage documents from the Judaean Desert. - Conclusions.

bibl.title: Law in the Documents of the Judaean Desert

bibl.seg: YIFTACH-FIRANKO Uri, Judaean Desert Marriage Documents and Ekdosis in the Greek Law of the Roman Period.
Ranon KATZOFF and David SCHAPS (Edd.), Law in the Documents of the Judaean Desert = Supplements to the Journal for the Study of Judaism. 96 (Leiden, 2005) pp. 67-84.

[Introduction.] The starting point of the discussion is P. Yadin I, 18. - The main features of the Ekdosis according to the Egyptian material. - The Ekdosis in the Greek marriage documents from the Judaean Desert. - Conclusions.
